item.title: The Choice Generation
item.description:
The Choice Generation by undefined Randall L. Ridd, Second Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency given in Saturday Evening of 184th Annual General Conference on Mon Mar 31 2014
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Randall L. Ridd, Second Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency
